/* MyTeamJoinRequestRepository.findAllByMyTeam */ SELECT A.TEAM_JOIN_REQUEST_SEQ , A.REQUEST_DATE , A.JOIN_REQUEST_STATE_CODE , A.CONFIRMATION_DATE , B.NAME , B.EMAIL , B.POSITION_CODE , B.HEIGHT , B.WEIGHT FROM TEAM_JOIN_REQUEST A INNER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEAM_SEQ = #{teamSeq} AND A.JOIN_REQUEST_TYPE_CODE = #{joinRequestTypeCode} /* 요청상태코드는 대기중(01), 거절(03)인 것만 조회 가능하다. */
AND A.JOIN_REQUEST_STATE_CODE = '01'
AND A.JOIN_REQUEST_STATE_CODE = '03'
AND A.JOIN_REQUEST_STATE_CODE IN ( '01', '03' )
